announcements.description: Add news through the public/news.json file.
An improved spinach genome and a spinach variome map described in Cai et al. (2021) have been released.
The SpinachBase manuscript published in DATABASE.
The expression profiles of 120 wild and cultivated accessions have been load into SpinachBase.
Spinach genome and transcriptome diversity paper published.
The spinach genome sequence is made public.
